external_games.name: Train Simulator: LNER Peppercorn Class K1 Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: LNER Peppercorn Class K1 Loco Add-On
summary: The LNER Peppercorn K1 locomotives were built between 1949 and 1950, with the intention of splitting them between the North Eastern and Eastern Regions. Many K1s would regularly be seen as far north as Edinburgh and they were frequently used on the West Highland line in the early days.
